dct_title_s: Afrique : publiée sous les auspices de Monseigneur le Duc d'Orléans, Prémier Prince du Sang
dct_description_sm: 1 map on 2 attached sheets : hand colored; 98 x 101 cm

par le Sr. d'Anville ; gravé par Guill. Delahaye ; Scale approximately 1:8,300,000 ; Relief shown pictorially ; Slight colorization marking borders ; Includes inset map of the Azores, descriptive notes and ornamental title cartouche ; Place names in French, Dutch and Portuguese. ; In French, Dutch, and Portuguese ; Paris : chés l'auteur aux Galeries du Louvre
dct_publisher_sm: chés l'auteur aux Galeries du Louvre
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
